comment.author: 10993986@N03
comment._content: palace pier is now the brighton pier of course, those arches are clubs now.

comment.author: 31747718@N05
comment._content: I co-own an Art Gallery 'Two Kats and a Cow' located in one of these arches....up the slope, next to the lamp post on the left. The area still retains its Edwardian charm - there are clubs and pubs ... which take over the area at night - but 100 years on, it all looks pretty much the same! Check out the gallery? www.twokatsandacow.com
